# Mathtype


$$
for \space D_i=\{0,1\}    \\$$
$$
\begin{aligned}
Var(D_i|x_i=x_j)&=\Pr(D_i|x_i=x_j)(1-\Pr(D_i|x_i=x_j))    \\
\Sigma^m_{j=1}Var(D_i|x_i=x_j)\Pr(D_i|x_i=x_j) &= \Pr(D_i|x_i=x_j)(1-\Pr(D_i|x_i=x_j))\Pr(x_i=x_j)    \\
\end{aligned}
$$
$$for \space x_i=\{1,2...m\}  $$  

$$\begin{aligned}
\Sigma^m_{j=1}Var(D_i|x_i=x_j)\Pr(D_i|x_i=x_j) &= \mathbb{E}[Var(D_i|x_i=x_j)]    \\
&=\mathbb{E}[\Pr(D_i|x_i=x_j)(1-\Pr(D_i|x_i=x_j))]    \\
&=\mathbb{E}[e(x_i)-(1-e(x_i))]  
\end{aligned}
$$
